ðŸ“– Summary: GPUPixel is a high-performance, cross-platform C++ library for real-time image and video filtering. It leverages OpenGL/ES to provide a wide range of effects, including beauty filters, and is compatible with iOS, Android, Mac, Windows, and Linux.
